name: New openings
company_info: Feeder is a food app that learns and recommends the food you love based on your eating behaviour. It was created and founded by John Doe, Anna Smith and Anthony Brown so that clients can spend more time eating food they like and less time scrolling through the endless options. Founded on strong social morals, it donates a meal to someone in need every time someone orders food delivery through the app. It can be downloaded on iOSand Android

name: Work with the leaders
company_info: Power Leaders brings P2P solar energy trading blockchain technology to the world. The technology allows renewable energy asset owners to decide who they want to sell their surplus energy to and at what price. It was founded by Jill Green, Jules Smith, Eleanor Martin and John Shaffert. To date, they have raised 14 million euros.
